fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Chemical policies,innovation policies,nanotechnology policies,trade negotiations and environment, climate and energy policies
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Publications of legal studies, position papers, participation to public consultations, media events (press conferences, briefings etc…). Organization of workshops (e.g. : Bridging the gap between science and policy in the field of nanomaterials), participation in workshops and public events.
goals__remit: CIEL uses the power of law to protect the environment, promote human rights, and ensure a just and sustainable society.
